bibl.title: The Excavation: Occupation History and Ceramic Assemblages.
bibl.note: The occupation history of Coptos from the pharaonic period to the Roman period.
HERBERT S.C. and A. BERLIN, The Excavation: Occupation History and Ceramic Assemblages.

S.C. HERBERT and A. BERLIN, with contributions by D.T. ARIEL, T.V. BUTTREY, E. FRIEDLAND, M. LAWALL, R.W. REDDING, and H.T.WRIGHT, Excavations at Coptos (Qift) in Upper Egypt, 1987-1992. Kelsey Museum of the University of Michigan - University of Assiut = Journal of Roman Archaeology. Supplementary Series. 53 = Kelsey Museum Fieldwork Series (Portsmouth, Rhode Island, 2003) pp. 12-156, tabl., 100 figg. et profils.
